name: Generic Top View Zombiez Shooter
description:
Originally released the 14th of November, 2012, this game was made as a school assignment.

The first "real" game developed, the aptly named Generic Top View Zombiez Shooter is a top-down survival game where you shoot zombiez and try to survive for as long as you can. Kill enough zombiez and a health power-up will spawn on the map, allowing you to live longer... if you can take it.

Tip: There's a mute button in the bottom left corner.
